path: ./Audit_Reports_2024/Verichains_Lab/Verichains Public Audit Report - SubWallet Extension - v1.1.pdf

findings.title: A01.Unprotected function call
findings.description: The audit report does not contain a finding with this title.

findings.title: A02.Insecure use of signatures for authentication
A03.Unvalidated user input
findings.description: The handlers make use of strict typing from TypeScript's declarations but do not involve type checking at runtime, making it open for attackers to fake data with wrong types, leading to unexpected behavior or errors.

findings.title: A05.Missing access modifiers
findings.description: Missing access modifiers can lead to unauthorized access and manipulation of variables.

findings.title: A06.Unsecured usage of sensitive data
findings.description: Unsecured usage of sensitive data can lead to unauthorized access or manipulation.
